Name: 12 HOURS
About the game: Indie horor from the first person. The protagonist was in a very nightmarish and realistic lucid dream, he needed to find a way to wake up, avoiding the creepy creature that was chasing him. Find a way to wake up, each time the level is generated randomly. What is available in the early version: - large game level; - enemies; - the level is generated each time in a new way; - creepy atmosphere; - story mini-quest.
